short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark ChatGPT responses and return to them later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage and revisit important responses from ChatGPT with the ChatGPT Bookmark Manager! This extension allows you to bookmark specific ChatGPT responses and navigate back to them at any time. 

Whether you're saving crucial information, interesting insights, or just want to keep track of important conversations, this tool makes it easy to organize and access your favourite responses.

ðŸš€ Features:
- Bookmark Responses: Add a bookmark icon next to ChatGPT responses for quick and easy saving.
- Navigate with Ease: Jump directly to any bookmarked response within the chat, even across different sessions.
- Organized Storage: View and manage all your saved bookmarks from the extension popup.
No Duplicate Tabs: Automatically switches to an existing ChatGPT tab if it's already open.

Enhance your ChatGPT experience by saving, organizing, and revisiting key responses effortlessly with the ChatGPT Bookmark Manager. Perfect for researchers, students, and anyone who uses ChatGPT regularly!
